p:
Moderate anti-HSV-1 and anti-HSV-2 activity of a methanolic extract of Ophirrhiza nicobarica was observed by Chattopadhyay et al.
132 At a concentration of 300 Î¼g/ml, the maximum nontoxic concentration, the extract completely inhibited plaque formation of both viruses. Pretreatment of the cells with the extract prior to viral infection did not decrease viral penetration or adsorption, nor did pretreatment of the virus reduce infectivity.
